domain

Class Distance

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.Distance

  • public class Distance
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a distance given by
    • yards
    • feet
    • inches
    that can be added and transformed to centimeters.

      • normalize

        private void normalize()

      • fromString

        public static Distance fromString(java.lang.String yfi)
        Constructs a distance given a String with the format {yards}y{feet}f{inches}i. No format errors are considered.
        Parameters:
        yfi - the given string with the correct format.
        Returns:
        returns the instance with the component given by the String.
